action.query: CREATE TABLE `#__users` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `parameters` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;

CREATE TABLE `#__events` ( `event_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `shortcode` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `folder` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `enabled` TINYINT(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `publish_up` DATETIME NULL, `image` varchar(255), `redirect` varchar(255), `notes` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`event_id`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;
ALTER TABLE `#__akeeba_common` MODIFY COLUMN `key` varchar(190) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `#__events` ADD COLUMN `redirect` varchar(255) AFTER `image`;
ALTER TABLE `#__events` ADD COLUMN `publish_up` DATETIME NULL AFTER `enabled`;
